title: Presunto Culpable
overview: Set in a small and idyllic fishing village in the Basque Country, the series tells the story of Jon Ar√≠stegui, a researcher who lives in Paris and who, after a terrible event, will be forced to return to the town where he was born and left six years ago. There he will have to face the ghosts of his past and a mystery that never came to be resolved: the disappearance of his girlfriend, Anne.
